issue.message: The application should not provide its own launch screen
A newer version of Gradle than 8.13 is available: 8.14.3
A newer version of com.android.application than 8.11.1 is available: 8.13.0. (There is also a newer version of 8.11.洧논 available, if upgrading to 8.13.0 is difficult: 8.11.2)
